description.zh: Cordys CRM 是一款开源的 AI 驱动客户关系管理系统，旨在帮助企业实现从线索到回款（L2C）的全流程管理。它覆盖线索获取、客户跟进、商机管理、合同签约及回款执行等环节，构建完整的销售运营闭环。基于现代化技术栈与AI能力集成，支持智能化自动化和数据驱动决策。
description.en: Cordys CRM is an open-source AI-powered Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system designed to help businesses manage the entire lead-to-cash (L2C) process. It supports end-to-end sales operations, including lead management, customer tracking, opportunity management, contract signing, and payment collection. Built with modern technology and AI integration, it enables intelligent automation and data-driven decision-making.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 灵活易用，支持基于角色的权限管控和模块化配置
- 安全可控，通过私有化部署保障数据主权
- AI 加持，可构建智能创建、智能跟进、智能报价等智能体
- BI 加持，支持数据可视化、自助分析和自然语言智能查询

## 功能列表:

- 支持从线索到回款（L2C）的全生命周期管理
- 可集成企业微信、钉钉、飞书等主流办公平台
- 基于角色的访问控制（RBAC），实现细粒度权限管理
- 通过 MCP Server 与 MaxKB 集成，支持 AI 智能体开发
- 使用 DataEase 实现销售数据可视化与分析
- 借助 SQLBot 实现自然语言转 SQL 查询
- 支持基于 Docker 的一键安装部署
- 支持离线环境下的离线安装包部署
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Flexible and user-friendly with role-based access control and modular configuration
- Secure and controllable via private deployment, ensuring full data ownership
- Enhanced by AI for building intelligent agents in lead creation, follow-up, and quoting
- Empowered by BI capabilities for data visualization, self-service analytics, and natural language querying

## Features:

- Full lifecycle management from lead to cash (L2C)
- Integration with enterprise platforms like WeCom, DingTalk, and Feishu
- Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for fine-grained permission management
- AI agent development via MCP Server integrated with MaxKB
- Sales data visualization and analysis using DataEase
- Natural language to SQL query conversion through SQLBot
- Docker-based deployment with one-click installation
- Offline installation support for air-gapped environments
